dict.string:
Prevents new notifications from removing the lockscreen album artwork. Forces the LS album artwork to show (whenever the media player plugin is active) & new notifications/or calls are received. Also, provides an option to show notifications after phone calls are received.
Useful if you dislike your lockscreen album artwork from disappearing whenever new notifications or calls are received.
[v.1] Tested with an iP6 9.3.3. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (9-10-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
LS - Always Show Album Artwork (Disable Notifications When Music Is Playing) ₉₋₁₀₋₁₆
Delete This Unit To Show Notifications After Missed Calls & To Remove Notifications Behind The Artwork
